participant_1.background:
I'm afraid that my cats will get too hot in the summer and that I won't be able to help them.
I write about my travels and experiences.
I try to take care of myself, but I don't spend a lot of time worrying about my appearance.
i love to cut down trees.
tomorrow is my first day of safety patrol.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last summer riding horses and learning more about music with friends who understand my passion.
i have a pet snake.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
I cosplay with my husband and enjoy going to Comic Con.
My wedding planning business took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Good! I just finished doing some cosplay makeup. I'm an avid cosplayer. What's your passion?
I love to write about my travels and experiences. I'm also a safety patroller.
That's really interesting! Do you have any fun stories from your travels that you'd like to share?
Oh, yeah! I have a lot of fun stories. I'm from California and I went to New York for the first time last summer. I was so excited to see all the big buildings.
That must have been amazing! I've always wanted to go to New York. Did you get to see any Broadway shows?
Yes! I went to see Hamilton and it was incredible. I'm not usually into musicals, but that one was really good.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a great time.
Me too! I'm already planning my next trip.
Where are you thinking of going?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to Europe or Asia.
Both of those places are amazing. I've been to Europe a few times and it's always been a great experience.
That's good to hear! I'm really excited to travel more
